summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a letter from the Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center to Judge Richard M. Berman regarding an inquiry about Jeffrey Epstein, who was in custody under case 19-cr-490. It appears to be official correspondence between court and prison staff following Epstein's arrest.

connections.description: Judge Berman sent an inquiry to Warden N'Diaye regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein, to which the Warden provided a response.
As Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center, N'Diaye was responsible for Epstein's custody and responded to a judicial inquiry about him.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 12, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and while he was in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Judge Richard M. Berman, who was presiding over case 19-cr-490, made a formal inquiry to the prison regarding Epstein.
Warden Lamine N'Diaye of the Metropolitan Correctional Center responded to Judge Berman's inquiry, indicating official oversight of Epstein's detention.
